file_content.text: No, it's okay! Father? Father, I can heal you. See? My powers can... can save you....
No, not now! Come on! Father. Don't leave me.
Your father is one with the Force now, Nadia.
He's at peace.
You did everything you could. We were just too late.
It's not your fault.
Enough. He's beyond our help.
Nadia, you must stop.
This is a bad dream. Or a test? Some Jedi test?
Everything's a test.
You. You did this!
Something like you shouldn't outlive my father.
Take one step toward the dark side and its pull becomes irresistible.
Revenge is a path to evil.
Killing him would betray everything you believe in.
Don't do this to yourself.
You don't understand. If I don't take justice for his death, my people--they'll turn against our family.
All father's good work in the Senate, lost. I won't let that happen. Not for this... thing!
Search your feelings. It's anger, not justice, that's driving you.
This is still about revenge.
You're wrong! I have to do it!
If you do this, I lose the Nadia I've come to know.
Please spare him. For me.
But he's... please, I don't know what to do.
Your father stood for cooperation and peace. Would he want you to murder for him?
And betray Grell's memory?
N--no, but for our family... what do I do?
Master. You're sending me away again.
He's gone. I let him go, and my family's disgraced.
You showed mercy and integrity. Senator Grell would be proud.
Nobody's disgraced.
You're not alone. Whatever you need, ask.
I'm here for you.
I just want father back.
You chose wisely.
I wish I could believe that.
That can be our secret.
No one has to know.
Are you sure? I don't want to lie to my people, but it's for the greater good, right?
I'm sorry, Father. We tried. Watch over us. I still need you.
He shouldn't stay here any longer. Please, would you--I can't lift him alone.
You're right. Stark's life shouldn't mean more than Senator Grell's.
Then kill him.
If you want him dead, I won't stop you.
Kill him if you wish.
I was curious. Is that so bad?
It's over. My duty's done.
See, Father. I'll be strong for you, our family, our world. I promise.
Would you help me? We can't leave him in this place.
